body_html: Yes, it is giving different answers, and I really don't know whether it is expected or not... In my opinion, these two statements should return the same result, but it appears that the GPU version returns [16, 0, 32, ..., 16] and the CPU version returns [1, 0, 3, ..., 1] (which is the exact argmin that I want). I'm new to pytorch so I'm quite confused about this behavior.

body: Yes, it is giving different answers, and I really don't know whether it is expected or not... In my opinion, these two statements should return the same result, but it appears that the GPU version returns [16,  0, 32,  ..., 16] and the CPU version returns [1, 0, 3, ..., 1] (which is the exact argmin that I want). I'm new to pytorch so I'm quite confused about this behavior.
